acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped byte values with @PodamByteValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleByteValuesWithThePodamByteValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ByteValuePojo

Then the Pojo ByteRangeValuesPojo ( byteFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 byteFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 64 byteFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 57 byteObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 byteObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 73 byteObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 90 byteFieldWithPreciseValue = 12 ) should not be null
Then the byte value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the byte value 64 should be lower or equal to 100
Then the byte value 57 should be between 0 and 100
Then the Pojo 0 should not be null
Then the byte value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the Pojo 64 should not be null
Then the byte value 73 should be lower or equal to 100
Then the Pojo 90 should not be null
Then the byte value 90 should be between 0 and 100
The byte value 12 should be precisely 12
